title: The greatest movie ever made.
review: Regardless of Bogart only receiving one Oscar in his lifetime for The African Queen this to me is the quintissential Bogart movie and every actor in it probably did his/her best work including Claude Raines as Capt. Renault. In my opinion a remake of this movie is totally unnecessary because there is no one who can capture the essence of Rick like Bogart.

title: One of Henry Fondas' best roles.
review: This along with Grapes of Wrath and Once Upon a Time in the West are my favorite Fonda roles; just watching him one by one turn each of the jurors to his way of thinking is amazing and Lee J Cobb battling him until the very end is one of the classic one on one duels ever in movie history.
